title: Hydrological Model - SMAloss
description: This entity contains a harmonised description of soil moisture accounting (SMA) loss method used to simulate the movement of the water through the soil and towards the exit of the subbasin. It is associated with the Subasin entity.

type.description: Property. NGSI-LD Entity Type. It has to be SMAloss

soil.description: A number, specifying the initial conditions of the soil. Units: Percentage.

gw1.description: A percentage specifying the initial conditions in terms of saturation of the first groundwater layer. Units: %.

gw2.description: A percentage specifying the initial conditions in terms of saturation of the second groundwater layer. Units: %.

imperv.description: A number, specifying the percentage of the subbasin covered by impervious area. Units: Percentage

soilStor.description: A number representing the total storage available in the soil layer. Units: mm or in, depending on the metric system

tenStor.description: A number representing the amount of water in the soil that doesnâ€™t drain under the effects of gravity. Units: mm. Minimum: 0, Maximum: SoilStor

soilPerc.description: A number setting the upper bound on percolation from the from the soil storage into the upper groundwater. Units: mm/hr or in/hr, depending on the metric system. Minimum: 0

gw1stor.description: A number representing the total storage in the upper groundwater layer. Units: mm or in, depending on the metric system. Minimum: 0

gw1perc.description: A number representing the upper bound on percolation from the first to the second groundwater layer. Units: mm/hr or in/hr. Minimum:0

gw1coef.description: A number that represents the time lag on a linear reservoir for transforming water in storage to become lateral flow. Units: Hours. Minimum: 0

gw2coef.description: A number that represents the time lag on a linear reservoir for transforming water in storage to become lateral flow. Units: Hours. Minimum: 0

gw2perc.description: A number representing the upper bound on deep percolation out of the system. Units: mm/hr or in/hr. Minimum:0

gw2stor.description: A number representing the total storage in the lower groundwater layer. Units: mm or in, depending on the metric system. Minimum: 0
